content: this is a quick and easy pattern for a tasty-looking cinnamon roll this cinnamon roll is a perfect addition to the play kitchen or why not hang it on your bag or in your christmas tree **materials** cotton yarn 50g = 160m crochet hook size 3 00 needle scissors stuffing stitch marker optional **yarn colors** brown beige white **stitches** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet happy crocheting
